name: RoFIsh: Prelude
description:
RoFIsh: Prelude - a surprising mix of a twisted adventure and a fishing sim, where you can play cards with crabs or catch a fish Dominic Toretto.

RoFIsh can be best described as a wild mix of Nancy Drew puzzles, Monkey Island's atmosphere and a russian fishing game's mechanics, with a bit of Naked Gun's humour. Also, you can play as a cat (=^･^=)

Feel free inform us of your feedback in the comments or contact us at npukojiteam@gmail.com! =)

You can add our game to your wishlist on Steam! =)
